title: Effect of public requests on other features
content:
If you configure public requests, you should note the following. 

Request on behalf

If a user creates a public request for another person, public scope looks at the Location and Organization of the other person.

Shopping cart

An offering may have an Allow public value of Optional. When a user adds such an offering to the shopping cart, Service Portal doesn't ask if the user wants to share the request the system will create.
